thread.section_title: Left Bank Saint Germain - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location, comfortable room
thread.title_full: Great location, comfortable room - Review of Left Bank Saint Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kiho8273
title: Great location, comfortable room
text:
This hotel offered good value for money and was in the perfect location, close to Notre Dame, Louvre, various other museums, shops, bistros, bars, Shakespeare & Co etc etc! A little further from Eiffel Tower and Arc de Triumph so although we managed to walk it, we wished we hadn't by the end! Despite being very central, you couldn't hear any noise through the excellent double glazing.
The bedroom was quite compact but very comfortable. We felt the hotel and room was slightly dated but equally very clean, tidy and characterful. The bathroom was modern however with bath and shower over. Very powerful & hot shower!
All in all, a good hotel and excellent location for the price! Very pleased!
